OOC: Ya know Jer, I might just keep Surgital a little longer than I wanted.=
  Hmm.....*thinks about it*  Nah!  Muahahaha!

IC: ::Triggerhappy/Skullgrin=
::

     Triggerhappy nodded at Megatron's orders.

      "Yes sir!" Trigge=
rhappy said.

       Triggerhappy transformed to jet mode, then flew around=
 the Element, and fired 2 blasts from each photon cannon at it(that's 4 pho=
ton blasts I think.  If it's more, then just say 4 anyway)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
       Skullgrin grinned(SkullGRIN-grinned?  he=
he) at his masters orders.

        "Yesss," Skullgrin said evilly.

      =
   Skullgrin transformed to Pretender mode.  Although he was dumber than a =
donkey, his strength was something that would be a good match for the Terro=
rcons any day.  He also stood at a about a good 12 feet tall.  Skullgrin ra=
n towards the first target he saw, Greven, and took his big club and then a=
ttempted to smash it down and shatter Greven's metallic skull.
